response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering the investment required to create such a masterpiece, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $18,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior quality. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 18000}
